about_the_game:
Dive into the realm of flawless beards and mustaches. Rise to become the premier stylist in town, carving your name with your distinct flair! Shift the trends, eliminate patchy beards, and establish your signature men’s grooming lounge. Whether you aim to channel a Celtic warrior, embody a metalhead, or epitomize a gentleman, now is your moment to make the cut!

Make the perfect trim!

Utilize the full set of barber’s tools to keep your clients' beards and mustaches in the finest style. Trim, shave, cut, and apply conditioner – keep it fresh! After all, facial hair is a statement piece – whether you’re more of a valiant Viking, a fierce metalhead, or an elegant gentleman

The Men's World

Create a place that will make the most miserly customer want to leave those 5$ haircuts behind. It’s time to set up your own space – a true barbershop where beards and mustaches are treated with the attention they deserve. Decorate it with manly touches that match your taste. Elevate your care routine and inject fresh vitality into your appearance. This isn’t just about getting a trim; it’s a way to express your identity.

No more patchy Beards!

We say "NO" to patchy beards! Bridge the gap in your facial hair and dictate your own rules and style. Whether it's lush beards or refined mustaches, they're no longer out of reach. The constraints are gone – the beard is yours to command!

Become a trendsetter!

Take up the beardmaster's mantle and render the hairstyling scene speechless! Carve out your name and rise up as the top trendsetter in town. Craft that one-of-a-kind look every guy’s after. Your chair, your rules – where styles are born and legends are made. Be the reason they dare to beard differently!

Key Features

  • The ability to cut and style beards
  • The ability to style mustaches
  • The ability to perform grooming treatments on beards and mustaches
  • New client characters – each with a unique story, special requirements, and full voice acting
  • New tools, like a shaving razor, beard beads or a beaver bristle brush
  • New in-game mechanics, such as combing beards, adding beads to beards, coloring beards, and more!
